thread.section_title: DesignCrowd Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of DesignCrowd | designcrowd.com
thread.title: Leilani

author: Leilani
title: Leilani
text: So I kind of stumbled across this website and then stumbled my way through the sign-up, but then there was someone remote logged in who was so willing to help, then came the emails offering assistance. I didn't really put enough info in when I signed up so then there was an email suggesting what info I should submit. All in all was not intrusive but intuitive and once you launch your project it's like watching Magic happen. The designers are amazing, it's like they see your words and thoughts in pictures and graphics. I loved the service and definitely, recommend the experience, thank you for the journey, I have a great end result.
